headline.main: Douglas Tompkins, 72, North Face Founder, Dies in Kayaking Accident

byline.original: By RACHEL ABRAMS and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

multimedia.caption: Douglas Tompkins at his home in Pumalin Park in Chile in 2005.
multimedia.copyright: Scott Dalton for The New York Times

saves.lead_paragraph: A hitchhiking encounter led to marriage and a store in San Francisco. Mr. Tompkins also founded the Esprit clothing brand before becoming a wealthy conservationist in South America.
